item.title: Karen add a quote by Nicholas Berdyaev
item.description: "Bread for me is a material question. Bread for my neighbor is a spiritual one." -- Nicholas Berdyaev

item.title: Karen add a quote by Edward Everett Hale
item.description: "I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do." -- Edward Everett Hale

item.title: Karen add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Lets have faith that right makes might; and in that faith let us, to the end, dare to do our duty as we understand it." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Karen add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first and love of soft living and the get-rich-quick theory of life." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Karen add a quote by George Washington
item.description: "To persevere in one's duty, and be silent is the best answer to calumny" -- George Washington

item.title: Karen add a quote by Spencer Johnson
item.description: "Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty is telling the truth to other people." -- Spencer Johnson

item.title: Karen add a quote by Paul Wellstone
item.description: "Never separate the life you lead from the words you speak." -- Paul Wellstone

item.title: Karen add a quote by Mary Anne Radmacher
item.description: "Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow." -- Mary Anne Radmacher

item.title: Karen add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Why yes, I can,' said Midas Mulligan, when he was asked whether he could name a person more evil than the man with a heart closed to pity. 'The man who uses another's pity for him as a weapon." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Karen add a quote by Steve Goodier
item.description: "We are stronger than we think. We have emotional, spiritual and even physical resources at our disposal. We may get knocked down, but we donâ€™t have to stay down." -- Steve Goodier

item.title: Karen add a quote by Rachael Bermingham
item.description: "Through adversity, not only are we given an opportunity to discover our inner strength, we are also given the gift of foresight so we can shine a light for others who go through the experience after us." -- Rachael Bermingham

item.title: Karen add a quote by Karen Salmansohn The Bounce Back Book: How t... The Bounce Back Book: How to Thrive in the Face of A
item.description: "It's essential you create a fiery will from within--harness that power of decisiveness--and choose to be your strongest self." -- Karen Salmansohn The Bounce Back Book: How t... The Bounce Back Book: How to Thrive in the Face of A
